price: Na miji hii ipo kwenye njia inayo pitiwa.
footnotes: Na mabaki ya mji huu yapo yamesalia. Nayo yapo njiani katika njia inayo pitiwa na watu. Anaye taka kuwaidhika kwayo anaweza kuwaidhika.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
